title: Sri Lanka Three Month Interbank Rate
description: Sri Lanka Three Month Interbank Rate was at 6.96 percent on Tuesday November 8. Interbank Rate in Sri Lanka averaged 11.05 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 27.58 percent in January of 2001 and a record low of 0.13 percent in January of 2015. In Sri Lanka, the interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks. This page provides - Sri Lanka Three Month Treasury Bill Yield - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Sri Lanka
